list.en: When is the due?
I wouldn't stoop to borrowing money.
list.cn: 我不会堕落到借钱的地步。

list.en: We intend to cut expenditure on traveling.
list.cn: 我们打算削减旅游开支。

list.en: I am afraid my electric Bill is going to be extremely high this month.
list.cn: 恐怕这个月我的电费要高得惊人了。

list.en: I'm scared I'll have to take out a second mortgage.
list.cn: 我怕我得申请二次抵押贷款。

list.en: I don't have fixed income.
Do you have life insurance?
I forgot the payment due date of my credit card.
list.cn: 我忘记了信用卡的还款日期。

list.en: It is very convenient to pay.
I don't have health insurance.
I can't accept credit card.
Everyone wants the stock market to go up.
list.cn: 每个人都希望股市上涨。

list.en: The expenditure of money on clothing is very large.
I'm a moonlight boy.
I can't afford that.
My income can't support the whole family.
list.cn: 我的收入不能养活全家。

list.en: I'm in the red.
It's payday again.
You must be earning decently, don't you?
When should I pay the Bill?
How are your stocks going?
My grandmother gets by on social security.
list.cn: 我祖母靠社会保险生活。

list.en: I'm a little short of money now.
You have to watch your spending.
I took out a life insurance policy and made my wife the beneficiary.
list.cn: 我买了一份人寿保险，受益人是我妻子。

list.en: You spend money as if it were going out of style.
list.cn: 你花钱就好像它已经过时了一样。

list.en: Can I pay by credit card?
list.cn: 我可以用信用卡支付吗?

list.en: What is your annual income?
A penny saved is a penny earned.
We pay a share of the gas, electricity and water bills.
list.cn: 我们分担煤气、电费和水费。

list.en: Where do you think we should save more money?
list.cn: 你认为我们应该在哪些方面多存钱?

list.en: How much is this going to set me back?
How much will the use of water and power come to?
list.cn: 水和电的使用要花多少钱?

list.en: How wasteful.
Could I buy and sell shares through your bank?
list.cn: 我可以通过你们银行买卖股票吗?

list.en: I want to trade stocks.
May I borrow ten dollars?
We spent more on electricity this month than in a year.
list.cn: 我们这个月的电费比一年来都多。

list.en: You'd better get some insurance, too, just in case.
list.cn: 你最好也买些保险，以防万一。

list.en: How shall I go about trading in a major corporation?
list.cn: 我该如何在大公司进行交易?

list.en: I'm a moonlight clan.
We have to watch our spending.
He is always borrowing money.
This is our insurance policy.
Stop wasting money for not necessary.
list.cn: 不要把钱浪费在不必要的事情上。

list.en: There is a quarterly charge for electricity.
It's an additional salary.
You'd better throw away your credit card.
list.cn: 你最好扔掉你的信用卡。

list.en: I have a family to feed.
That's waste of money.
You're gone through all your money so quickly.
When is the rent due?
Pay off your credit cards every month.
list.cn: 每个月还清你的信用卡。

list.en: I have a credit card but I never overdraft.
list.cn: 我有一张信用卡，但我从不透支。

list.en: Could you lend me some money?
Do you know what stocks are low right now?
list.cn: 你知道现在哪些股票很低吗?

list.en: I can't even afford to eat this week.
She is a price conscious homemaker.
list.cn: 她是一个注重价格的家庭主妇。

list.en: I can't save a single penny.
Do you know your total expenditure of the whole year?
list.cn: 你知道你全年的总支出吗?

list.en: I discouraged him from borrowing money.
Here is the phone Bill.
I didn't bring very much money with me.
Many more people buy insurance in America than in China.
list.cn: 在美国买保险的人比在中国多得多。

list.en: I paid out of my own pocket.
How many listed companies are there all together?
list.cn: 一共有多少家上市公司?

list.en: I run out of money every month.
What types of insurance can you accept?
Can you lend me some money?
Can I place my order by phone?
